data.title: Twitter Chat: Private Sector Engagement & Sustainable Development Goals for Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn, Child and Adolescent Health
data.meta_description: The Global Financing Facility for women, children and adolescentsÂ (GFF) and Every Women, Every Child hosted a Twitter
data.text: The Global Financing Facility for women, children and adolescents (GFF) and Every Women, Every Child hosted a Twitter chat that focused on the role of private sector and how they play in achieving the goals of the GFF and in delivering on the SDGs for women, children and adolescents. Peter Singer @PeterASinger, Chief Executive Officer of Grand Challenges Canada and Sneha Kanneganti, Private Sector Engagement Specialist for the GFF took part of the conversation.
